name: It Came From COW-ter Space!
description:
Made for the 8 Bits to Infinity - Mouse Only Jam.
Theme: ANOTHER WORLD

This is a pick up and MOOOOOve game... I'm sorry.

Aliens have abducted almost all of your cows. You must protected your last 4 cows for as long as possible by picking them up and moving them out of the alien's path. 
You must have at least 2 to continue your farm.

Score increases based on the number of cows you have. 

The goal of the game was to make a fun little 5 min experience using free online assets. Links to the asset creators can be found in the credits of the game.
